title: To the right Honourable the Lord Mayor, the right worshipfull the aldermen and commons of the City of London in Common Councell assembled. The humble petition of divers well affected citzens and free men of London, under the jurisdiction of the Lord Mayor.
notes: Against the Independents, in favour of church union with the Scotch, etc.--Thomason Catalogue. Cf. also Thomason E.338[7].
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Composed and finished June ye 5th 1646, I having hand in it, both in composing it and promoting it".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
